SELECT NO, EMPNO, ENAME, JOB, MGR, TO_CHAR(HIREDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') as HIREDATE, SAL, COMM, DEPTNO FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS NO, EMPNO, ENAME, JOB, MGR, HIREDATE, SAL, COMM, DEPTNO FROM EMP WHERE ROWNUM <= ${param1}*${param2} ) WHERE NO >= ${param1}*${param2} - (${param2}-1)
select empno from emp where empno=${id}
mapper.update: UPDATE EMP SET ENAME=#{ename}, JOB=#{job}, MGR=#{mgr, jdbcType=INTEGER}, HIREDATE=#{hiredate}, SAL=#{sal, jdbcType=INTEGER}, COMM=#{comm, jdbcType=INTEGER}, DEPTNO=#{deptno, jdbcType=INTEGER} WHERE EMPNO=#{empno}
